Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12,000 to me due to its unique features, craftsmanship, and the time invested in its development. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers to you, I kindly propose a price of $9,500 for this product. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between valuing my investment and providing you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
